promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic mythical owl electric-type pokemon wearing golden gemstones. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or owl. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldenvoltaic, a a dynamic mythical owl electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Grand Bolt, Twister Lutz. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "owl", "electric" or "Goldenvoltaic". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, owl-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: Known to dwell in high altitudes, this mythical creature harnesses the force of lightning. Its Grand Bolt and Twister Lutz are as majestic and dynamic as the dance of the northern lights.
